article_title: Why Every Small Employer Should Sign Up For Obamacare's SHOP Exchange

article_metadata.description: Many sections of the navigator manual address implementation of the SHOP exchanges for small businesses. After digesting the instructions, I realized that it is insane for employers to NOT offer insurance if they have less than fifty full time equivalent employees. I explain why.
article_metadata.author: Carolyn McClanahan
